title: GLoan
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

**Get Started with GLoan**

- [How much can I borrow with GLoan?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005986946-How-much-can-I-borrow-with-GLoan)
- [Can I apply for a GLoan?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900006974863-Can-I-apply-for-a-GLoan)
- [What are the GLoan fees I need to know about?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/6145865592985-What-are-the-GLoan-fees-I-need-to-know-about)
- [Why is my next GLoan offer smaller than the last one?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30376185137561-Why-is-my-next-GLoan-offer-smaller-than-the-last-one)

**Pay your GLoan**

- [How can I pay my GLoan dues?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900007729563-How-can-I-pay-my-GLoan-dues)
- [When do I pay for my GLoan?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39051542623257-When-do-I-pay-for-my-GLoan)
- [What happens when I pay my total GLoan outstanding balance in advance?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30350171784217-What-happens-when-I-pay-my-total-GLoan-outstanding-balance-in-advance)
- [How does GCash help with my GLoan payment?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30351961433369-How-does-GCash-help-with-my-GLoan-payment)

**Manage your GLoan Account**

- [How can I update my mobile number for my GLoan account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30655381979161-How-can-I-update-my-mobile-number-for-my-GLoan-account)
- [Who is the lender of my GLoan?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30654917327129-Who-is-the-lender-of-my-GLoan)
- [How do I delete my GLoan account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30660239975833-How-do-I-delete-my-GLoan-account)

**GLoan Sakto**

- [How do I pay for my GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40675961653913-How-do-I-pay-for-my-GLoan-Sakto)
- [Am I qualified for GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40675903982361-Am-I-qualified-for-GLoan-Sakto)
- [What is the difference between GLoan and GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40675860785177-What-is-the-difference-between-GLoan-and-GLoan-Sakto)
- [What is GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/21435929589657-What-is-GLoan-Sakto)

**Get Help with GLoan**

- [Why am I not eligible for GLoan?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39388172019353-Why-am-I-not-eligible-for-GLoan)
- [I am encountering an error in applying for GLoan. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39387977291929-I-am-encountering-an-error-in-applying-for-GLoan-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t make a payment for my GLoan account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39051175012377-I-can-t-make-a-payment-for-my-GLoan-account-What-do-I-do)
- [I was charged multiple times for one GLoan payment. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39051007470489-I-was-charged-multiple-times-for-one-GLoan-payment-What-do-I-do)
- [I still haven’t received my GLoan interest cashback after 14 days. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39050895669145-I-still-haven-t-received-my-GLoan-interest-cashback-after-14-days-What-should-I-do)
[See all 8 articles](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/39050559379737-Get-Help-with-GLoan)
